org.apache.hadoop.fs

Class FSMainOperationsBaseTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystemTestHelper
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.FSMainOperationsBaseTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestFSMainOperationsLocalFileSystem, TestFSMainOperationsLocalFileSystem

    public abstract class FSMainOperationsBaseTest
extends FileSystemTestHelper

    A collection of tests for the FileSystem. This test should be used for testing an instance of FileSystem that has been initialized to a specific default FileSystem such a LocalFileSystem, HDFS,S3, etc.

    To test a given FileSystem implementation create a subclass of this test and override setUp() to initialize the fSys FileSystem instance variable. Since this a junit 4 you can also do a single setup before the start of any tests. E.g.
